attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the Government appoints a Tax Ombudsman with the power to Veto Tax increases that destroy the economy and employment. Business rate hikes equal no shops,Motor taxes equal lost new sales,retrospective tax wipes out used sales, fuel tax leave us open to market prices causing mayhem, all of the above creates mass unemployment and worst of all, hits the poor the hardest. This stupidity has to stop before the economy is wiped out by sensless ill thought out taxation. Chancellor THINK !
How would you survive on less than 10k pa as most of us HAVE TO ?
